jchain.bc

Class Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.bc.Header
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hashable

    public class Header
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hashable
    Represents a block header in a blockchain system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int VERSION_NUMBER 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Header(java.lang.String prevBlockHash, java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList, int nonce)
      Returns an instance of a block header constructed from the previous block hash and the transactions list.

      • Header

        public Header(java.lang.String prevBlockHash,
              java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList,
              int nonce)
        Returns an instance of a block header constructed from the previous block hash and the transactions list.
        Parameters:
        prevBlockHash - The hash of the previous block in the chain.
        txList - A list of transactions.
        nonce - The nonce for the block.
